Weddings

A couple's wedding day will go down as one of the most important days of their lives. Trust Bangarang to make it a day you'll be able to relive forever. We take the time to get to know each couple we work with and carefully cater to their wishes. Our cinematic approach results in a breathtaking video that not only you, but your friends and family, can enjoy for generations to come.

Please contact us at weddings@bangarangfilms.com for package pricing information and/or more examples of our work.

Premium Package

  • 2 Cameras - Full Ceremony & Reception Coverage

  • Edited with Music and Graphics

  • 3 Basic DVDs

This option covers the ceremony and reception from two cameras, capturing the most memorable moments, and is edited together with music and graphics.


Deluxe Package

  • 2 Cameras - Full Day Coverage (Pre-ceremony, Photo Shoot, Ceremony and Reception)

  • Edited with Music, Pictures and Graphic Titles

  • 5 Deluxe DVDs - Complete with Custom Menus, Labels, Music, and Extra Features

This option covers the entire day, with a camera at each location to film Bride & Groom getting ready, and full multi-camera coverage of the photo shoot, ceremony and reception. The final product is movie quality and is edited together with custom graphics and music selected by the Wedding party.


VIP Package

  • 2-3 Cameras - Full Weekend Coverage (Rehearsal Dinner, Pre-ceremony, Photo Shoot, Ceremony and Reception)

  • Edited With Music, Pictures and Graphic Titles

  • Wedding Party Deluxe DVDs - Complete with Custom Menus, Labels, Music, and Extra features for the entire Wedding Party and Parents of the Bride and Groom.

This option covers the entire wedding weekend, with two cameras at the rehearsal dinner, a camera at each location to film the Bride & Groom getting ready, and full multi-camera coverage of the photo shoot, ceremony and reception. The final product is movie quality and is edited together with custom graphics and music selected by the Wedding party.

All of our wedding packages are filmed using top of the line HD Cameras complete with high quality audio. Each package also comes with a DVD option. The Basic DVD auto-plays the video when played in a DVD Player. Our Deluxe DVD has custom menus, labels, music, and bonus features. The bonus features offer extended footage of first dances, speeches, etc. and can be customized to include additional footage of your choosing.

VIDEO PRODUCTION IN BOSTON, MA
